comment: Very helpful, would take him again

Professor Murry is a very sweet guy. There were a couple quizzes and some papers, but he graded easy. The whole class time was pretty much discussions and there were a lot of group activities. Easy A!

He's pretty cool. Does a lot of group work. Almost every day. Only a couple of quizzes, but lots of papers. They're pretty easy though. He lets you revise a couple of them and turn them back in for a better grade. Sometimes I just didn't understand what he wanted us to do for certain assignments. I got an A.

Very awesome teacher. This was my favorite class the entire semester. The essays are interesting, and the discussions are fun. He's very knowledgeable in his field. I'm pursuing an English minor because of this class. Take him.

Great Guy!He truly sparked an intrest for writing in me.He really wants students to make the most of the class and succeed.He can be a little unclear about what he wants sometimes but it's manageable.Best part about the class were discussions(which were like everday).Also I believe this class in an easy A.I have never gotten an A in english til now
Absolutely LOVED this teacher! Definitely take him! If I could take him again, I would. Easy A and he is extremely nice and open minded!

When you asked for clarification he would describe something and then say "but not really." But the assignments were easy and if his directions weren't clear and a lot of people didn't do it exactly how he wanted it, he still acknowledged attempt and participation. We did peer reviews that were very helpful.
Really funny guy.. I wish i could have got his 1102 class.. Take him.
Really nice guy, very personable. He relates to his students very well and assigns interesting work.
Took him twice, EASYYYYYYYY A...enough said. can miss 3 classes.
TAKE HIM! I am horrible in english, & this class is exterrmly easy. Hes very laid back and understanding.Im a slacker and still have a great grade in the class.

This professor is amazing! He is flexible and willing to work with students.  The essays were more to teach about different writing styles rather than your actual writing ability. attendance is mandatory but he makes class fun.  Lots of discussion time where you can state your opinions freely. Outstanding guy who genuinely loves what he does.
i loved this prof! very helpful and positive. does cool assignments and topics. don't use the book much at all. would highly encourage you to take his class.
Really easy class, especially if you are coming from an AP class in high school. Show up or the grade drops.

Not a hard class at all. Lots of bs class discussions and very easy papers. Each paper also has a revision grade worth as many points as the rough draft, which means adding a body paragraph to get an A. A little crazy, but not too bad.
